page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT FILMS
page.content: Return of the Jedi is one of a series of{fantasy films}featuring men and robots who use laser weapons in their battles. The hero is Luke Skywalker. One of the horrible, fierce, heavy- breathing robots is Luke's father. He wears a dark mask, and is called Darth Vader. He has been turned to the "Dark Side" by the Dark Monster, the Emperor. In the first film, Star Wars, the Emperor designed a mechanical moon called the Death Star. The film ends with the hero and his friends escaping after destroying this artificial planet. George Lucas wrote and produced the films and I enjoyed them very much. I have books, toys and games connected with them. Sometimes the actors are replaced by stuntmen or dummies when it is too dangerous for the film stars.
